videos.description: Episode 1 is the first episode of Part 1 of Netflix's Money Heist. It aired on December 20, 2017.   The Professor recruits a young female robber and seven other criminals for a grand heist, targeting the Royal Mint of Spain.
videos.subtitle: Netflix
videos.title: Money Heist Season 1 Episode 1

videos.description: Hostage negotiator Raquel makes initial contact with the Professor. One of the hostages is a crucial part of the thieves' plans.
videos.subtitle: By Blender Foundation
videos.title: Money Heist Season 1 Episode 2

videos.description: Police grab an image of the face of one of the robbers. Raquel is suspicious of the gentleman she meets at a bar.
videos.subtitle: By Google
videos.title: Money Heist Season 1 Episode 3

videos.description: Raquel suffers a personal crisis with her ex. The hostages attempt to contact polices, but they are frightened by the gunshots they overheard. The thieves argue among themselves.
videos.subtitle: By Google
videos.title: Money Heist Season 1 Episode 4

videos.description: The thieves let a medical team enter the Mint, and an undercover policeman sneaks in with them. Can the Professor stay one step ahead of Raquel?
videos.subtitle: By Google
videos.title: Money Heist Season 1 Episode 5

videos.description: Mónica's condition worsens. The Professor enjoys the spoils of his latest trick. Río is disturbed by news he sees on the television.
videos.subtitle: By Google
videos.title: Money Heist Season 1 Episode6

videos.description: A break in the investigation and a mistake by one of the thieves puts the Professor at serious risk of being discovered.
videos.subtitle: By Google
videos.title: Money Heist Season 1 Episode 7

videos.description: Tokyo catches Alison chatting with Río and confronts her. The police suspect a spy is in their midst.
videos.subtitle: By Blender Foundation
videos.title: Money Heist Season 1 Episode 8

videos.description: The Professor races to stop a witness from identifying him. Berlín seeks revenge once his own name is revealed and slandered in the press.
videos.subtitle: By Garage419
videos.title: Money Heist Season 1 Episode 9

videos.description: Raquel enters the Mint to ascertain that all of the hostages are still alive and well. Nairobi gives Alison advice.
videos.subtitle: By Blender Foundation
videos.title: Money Heist Season 1 Episode 10

videos.description: Ángel and Raquel question each other's loyalties. Mónica makes a move on Denver. Río is faced with a difficult decision.
videos.subtitle: By Garage419
videos.title: Money Heist Season 1 Episode 11

videos.description: Arturo continues to formulate an escape plan for a group of hostages. The Professor reveals who gave him the idea for the heist.
videos.subtitle: By Garage419
videos.title: Money Heist Season 1 Episode 12

videos.description: The Professor meets Raquel's mother under stressful circumstances. At the Mint, the thieves offer the hostages a decision: money or freedom?
videos.subtitle: By Garage419
videos.title: Money Heist Season 1 Episode 13
